summary: Phase 6 Quick Wins testing completed successfully. All 44 backend API tests pass. UI dashboard at /phase6 displays all 17 Nigeria-first business verticals across 3 phases with correct stats, pricing in NGN, and strategy information. Business Setup Wizard at /partner-portal/business-setup correctly requires authentication.
critical_code_review_comments: All 17 business presets are configuration-only - NO schema changes as designed
All presets use NGN currency with Nigerian-specific pricing (setupFee and monthlyBase)
Demo data includes Nigerian context: Lagos/Abuja areas, Nigerian names, Nigerian phone formats (080/081/090/070/091)
All presets reference existing frozen suites (commerce, logistics, hospitality, civic, education, sites_funnels)
Phase 6.1 (Commerce): 6 presets - Retail Store, Supermarket, Market/Trade, Online Store, Restaurant, Event Ticketing
Phase 6.2 (Services): 6 presets - Beauty Salon, Laundry, Cleaning, Repair, Auto Workshop, Courier
Phase 6.3 (Community): 5 presets - NGO, Alumni Portal, Sales Agent, Gate Pass, Parking
/phase6 dashboard is public (no auth required) - correct for partner showcase
/partner-portal/business-setup requires authentication - correct for tenant creation

success_rate.frontend: 100% (Phase 6 dashboard loads correctly, all 17 verticals displayed, NGN pricing shown)

test_credentials: None required - Phase 6 dashboard is public
seed_data_creation: None - uses configuration-only presets from registry.ts
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 6 Quick Wins implementation is complete. 17 business verticals are configured via presets in /app/frontend/src/lib/business-presets/registry.ts. Demo data generators in demo-data.ts provide Nigerian-realistic data. Landing page templates in landing-templates.ts are ready for Sites & Funnels integration. The /phase6 dashboard is public for partner showcase. Business Setup Wizard at /partner-portal/business-setup requires authentication.

backend_apis: GET /api/business-presets - Returns all 17 presets with summary counts (PASSED)
POST /api/business-presets action=get-demo-data - Returns Nigerian demo data (PASSED)
All presets have NGN currency pricing (PASSED)
All presets have nigeriaContext with tax rate and payment methods (PASSED)
All presets reference valid base suites (PASSED)
Demo data includes Nigerian phone numbers (080/081/090/070/091) (PASSED)
Demo data includes Nigerian menu items (Jollof, Egusi, etc.) (PASSED)
frontend_pages: /phase6 - Dashboard loads with header 'Phase 6 — Quick Wins' (PASSED)
/phase6 - Phase 6.1 section shows: Retail Store, Supermarket, Market/Trade, Online Store, Restaurant, Event & Ticketing (PASSED)
/phase6 - Phase 6.2 section shows: Beauty Salon, Laundry, Cleaning Services, Repair Services, Auto Workshop, Courier (PASSED)
/phase6 - Phase 6.3 section shows: NGO/Nonprofit, Alumni Association, Sales Agents, Gate Pass, Parking Management (PASSED)
/phase6 - All 17 NGN monthly prices displayed (₦Xk/mo format) (PASSED)
/phase6 - Phase 6 Strategy card with 4 strategy points (PASSED)
/phase6 - Suite badges (commerce, logistics, hospitality, civic, education) displayed (PASSED)
ui_interactions: Refresh button - Clickable and refreshes data (PASSED)
Launch Business Setup Wizard button - Present and navigates correctly (PASSED)

mocked_apis_note: NOT MOCKED - Business presets are configuration-only using existing suite services. All data comes from static TypeScript configuration files.
